p: Polysorbate 80 and sorbitan monooleate were obtained from Praid (São Roque, SP, Brazil). n-alkanes (C 7–C 40), limonene, acetylthiocholine iodide (ATCI) and 5,5-dithiobis-2-nitrobenzoic acid (DTNB) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). Distilled water was used for general procedures. All chemicals were of analytical grade.
